title: Retro Arcade: Add Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper with routing, leaderboard integration, and previews

requirements.summary: Implement three new classic game pages (Frogger, Galaga, Minesweeper) with consistent UI/UX patterns and score submission dialog using the existing React Query mutation flow.
acceptanceCriteria: There are new routes/pages for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper that render and run without runtime errors.
Each new game has a scoring system and triggers a game-over (or win/lose) state that opens a name-entry dialog to submit the score.
Submitting a score uses the existing score submission flow (React Query mutation) and shows success/error toast feedback consistent with existing games.
All user-facing text on the new pages is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated Frogger playable page (React/TypeScript) following existing game-page UI patterns: header back button, score panel, how-to-play panel, pause/reset controls where applicable, and an end-of-game score submission dialog using useSubmitScore with sonner toast feedback. Use existing shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Dialog, Input, Label) to match the app’s UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated Galaga playable page (React/TypeScript) following existing game-page UI patterns: header back button, score panel, how-to-play panel, pause/reset controls where applicable, and an end-of-game score submission dialog using useSubmitScore with sonner toast feedback. Use existing shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Dialog, Input, Label) to match the app’s UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated Minesweeper playable page (React/TypeScript) following existing game-page UI patterns: header back button, score panel, how-to-play panel, pause/reset controls where applicable, and an end-of-game (win/lose) score submission dialog using useSubmitScore with sonner toast feedback. Use existing shadcn/ui components (Card, Button, Dialog, Input, Label) to match the app’s UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Wire new game pages into routing and navigation so Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper are reachable from the Home game grid and from the Leaderboard page, including leaderboard deep-linking with a selected game.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/App.tsx includes routes for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx includes route mappings for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper so 'Play Now' navigates correctly.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx allows selecting Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper and the 'Play {game}' button navigates to the correct route.
Leaderboard deep-linking via /leaderboard?game=<GameName> works for the new games.

file_operations.description: Register new routes for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper and wire them into the existing TanStack Router route tree so the pages are navigable.
Extend the Home page route mapping to include Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper so each new game card’s 'Play Now' navigation resolves to the correct path.

Update leaderboard navigation wiring to support Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper selection and ensure the 'Play {game}' button routes correctly. Also ensure selected game can be deep-linked and synchronized via the /leaderboard?game=<GameName> search param.

requirements.summary: Generate Leaderboard game tabs dynamically from the backend’s available games list instead of a hard-coded constant, keeping top-10 fetch behavior intact.
acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard tabs are generated from the fetched available games list.
If the backend returns additional games in the future, they automatically show up as leaderboard tabs.
When switching tabs, the leaderboard fetches and displays the top scores for that selected game (still capped to top 10 by the existing query logic).

file_operations.description: Replace the hard-coded game list with data from useGetAvailableGames, rendering Tabs/TabsTrigger/TabsContent based on the fetched list. Keep the existing useGetHighScores(selectedGame) top-10 behavior, and keep selectedGame state synchronized with the search param for deep-linking. Use existing shadcn/ui Tabs components for the tab UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add static preview images for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper under the generated assets convention and render them on Home page game cards.
acceptanceCriteria: New preview images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the required filenames.
Home page game cards for Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper display the correct preview image and do not render broken images.
No preview images are served from or routed through the backend.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static preview image asset for Frogger at frontend/public/assets/generated/frogger-preview.dim_300x200.png.
Add the generated static preview image asset for Galaga at frontend/public/assets/generated/galaga-preview.dim_300x200.png.
Add the generated static preview image asset for Minesweeper at frontend/public/assets/generated/minesweeper-preview.dim_300x200.png.

Extend the Home page gameImages mapping to include Frogger, Galaga, and Minesweeper preview images using the static asset convention paths: frontend/public/assets/generated/frogger-preview.dim_300x200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/galaga-preview.dim_300x200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/minesweeper-preview.dim_300x200.png.
